question.text: Which of the following is incorrect?

options.text: Double fertilization is characteristics of angiosperm
Double fertilization was discovered by Nawaschin
Pollen tube shows apical growth and chemotropic movement
Wind pollination is common in legumes

solution.text: Double fertilization is the characteristics of angiosperm which was discovered by Nawaschin in plant Lilium and Fritillaria. Double fertilization includes syngamy and triple fusion. Pollen tube shows apical growth and chemotropic movement control by the filiform apparatus of synergid. Wind pollination is quite common in grasses. In legumes, flower has vexillary aestivation and shows self-pollination.
